attributes.action: Remove Jackie Doyle Price as MP for the borough of Thurrock in Essex
attributes.additional_details:
Rolling over & giving up the fight ewgarding the proposed route for the new Lower Thames Crossing & not even listening to the vast majority of Thurrock residents.

The extreme lack of support with on-going timetable change issues with C2C rail since December 2015.
attributes.background:
Her complete lack of disregard, contempt & dis-engagement from her constituents regarding EXTREMELY important local issues - more details below!

The time has come for her to be replaced by someone who cares & WILL represent their voting public!

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions. This is a decision for the electorate in Thurrock.
